gold: The graph shows the most affordable digital camera brands by price . Konica is the cheapest with an average price of £ 54 , followed by Hunten at £ 58 , then Sigma at £ 62 . The most expensive brand is Cambo at £ 76 , closely followed by Memota at £ 70 .
